form.title: {"Dashboard - " || tostring(toint(100*((tofloat(tc_done) + tofloat(jira_done)) / (tofloat(tc_exec_sum) + tofloat(jira_sum))))) || "% (" || tostring(toint(tc_done) + toint(jira_done)) || " of " || tostring(toint(tc_exec_sum) + toint(jira_sum)) || ")"}

let.value: {Select Sum(t.participation) From tester t Where t.work_type = "Testing" AND t.tester_active = "Active"}
{Select Sum(t.participation) From tester t Where t.work_type = "Test writing" AND t.tester_active = "Active"}
{SELECT COUNT(ts.tester_email) FROM tester ts WHERE ts.tester_role = "Tester"}
{SELECT case when toint(gethour(today)) >= 9 THEN (case when toint(gethour(today)) >= 17 THEN 0 ELSE 17-(toint(gethour(today))+1) END) ELSE 8 END}
{SELECT case WHEN toint(gethour(today)) >= 9 THEN (case when toint(gethour(today)) >= 17 THEN 0 ELSE 60-toint(getminute(today)) END)ELSE 0 END}
{Select envVal.value From environmentValues envVal Where envVal.name = "finishYear"}
{Select envVal.value From environmentValues envVal Where envVal.name = "finishMonth"}
{Select envVal.value From environmentValues envVal Where envVal.name = "finishDay"}
{Select envVal.value From environmentValues envVal Where envVal.name = "finishYearOfTestWriting"}
{Select envVal.value From environmentValues envVal Where envVal.name = "finishMonthOfTestWriting"}
{Select envVal.value From environmentValues envVal Where envVal.name = "finishDayOfTestWriting"}
{Select h.id, h.dateFrom, h.user From holidays h Where ADDDAY(sysp.dtlFormOpen, toint(weekendsToWrite+daysToWrite)) >= h.dateFrom AND h.dateFrom >= sysp.dtlFormOpen}
{Select Count(adHoli.id) From holidayAdvancedInPrediod adHoli Where adHoli.user = "ALL"}
{Select tofloat(envVal.value) From environmentValues envVal Where envVal.name = "hrAvgTestRuntime"}
{Select COUNT(tk.result) From task tk Where tk.result = "success" OR tk.result = "failed"}
{Select COUNT(tk.result) From task tk Where tk.result = "not yet started"}
{Select COUNT(tk.result) From task tk}
{SELECT tofloat(COALESCE(dbTesterForTesting, testersCount))}
{SELECT case when remainingTests = 0 THEN tofloat(0) ELSE ((remainingTests) * hrAvgTestRuntime)/finalTesterForTesting END}
{Select case when requiredWorkingHours-remains_from_today_hour > 0 THEN requiredWorkingHours-remains_from_today_hour ELSE 0 END}
{Select case when toint((corrigated_req_hour/8)*100)%100 = 0 then corrigated_req_hour/8 else toint(corrigated_req_hour/8)+1 end}
{Select ADDDAY(sysp.dtlFormOpen, toint(roundDay+holiday+roundDay/5*2))}
{Select case when dayofweek(endDate) = 0 then ADDDAY(endDate, 1) when dayofweek(endDate) = 6 then ADDDAY(endDate, 2) else endDate End}
{Select SUM(tw.planned_count) From test_to_be_write_category tw}
{Select COUNT(td.id) From test_to_be_write_done td WHERE td.status = "Done"}
{SELECT COALESCE(dbTesterForWriting, testersCount)}
{SELECT ((totalTestToWriteCount - totalTestWriteDone) * hrAvgTestRuntime)/finalTesterForWriting+1/2}
{Select case when toint((requiredWorkingHoursToWrite)*100)%100 = 0 then requiredWorkingHoursToWrite else toint(requiredWorkingHoursToWrite)+1 end}
{SELECT toint(roundDayToWrite)}
{SELECT (daysToWrite/5*2)+1}
{Select ADDDAY(sysp.dtlFormOpen, weekendsToWrite+daysToWrite+holiday)}
{Select case when dayofweek(endDateOfTestWriting) = 0 then ADDDAY(endDateOfTestWriting, 1) when dayofweek(endDateOfTestWriting) = 6 then ADDDAY(endDateOfTestWriting, 2) else endDateOfTestWriting End}
{Select ADDDAY(endDateOfTestWriting, 14)}

{Select case when dayofweek(endDateOfTestWritingPlusExtraTime) = 0 then ADDDAY(endDateOfTestWritingPlusExtraTime, 1) when dayofweek(endDateOfTestWritingPlusExtraTime) = 6 then ADDDAY(endDateOfTestWritingPlusExtraTime, 2) else endDateOfTestWritingPlusExtraTime End}
{TODATE(toint(GETYEAR(sysp.dtlFormOpen)), toint(finishMonthOfTestRunning), toint(finishDayOfTestRunning),0,0,0)}
{select ph.date, ph.imp_done, ph.imp_total, ph.tc_exec_done, ph.tc_exec_total, ph.sum_done, ph.tester_number, ph.exp_end_of_testing from progress_history ph}
{select count(pht.date) from progress_history_table pht}

table.recordset: {SELECT c.id, c.dateFrom, c.user FROM holidayAdvancedInPrediod c}

textview.text: {"Actual finish date: " || tostring(FORMATDTL( endDateCalculatedWeekend,(dtf yyyy "-" MM "-" dd)))}
{"Tester count who is writeing tests: " || tostring(dbTesterForWriting)}
{"Required working days to write tests: " || tostring(requiredWorkingHoursToWrite)}
{"Required rounded working days to write tests: " || tostring(roundDayToWrite)}
{"Actual finish date with test writing: " || tostring(FORMATDTL( endDateOfTestWritingCalculatedWeekend,(dtf yyyy "-" MM "-" dd)))}
{"Actual finish date with test writing and 2 week of late preparation: " || tostring(FORMATDTL( endDateOfTestWritingPlusCalculatedWeekend,(dtf yyyy "-" MM "-" dd)))}

let.value: {select count(tet.task_id) from task_env_table tet where tet.result="success" and tet.tc_impreg="imp"}

textview.text: {select tostring(count(tet.task_id)) from task_env_table tet where tet.result is not "not tested" and tet.tc_impreg="imp"}

let.value: {toint(100*((tofloat(imp_done_today)) / (tofloat(imp_all_today.text))))}
{select count(tet.task_id) from task_env_table tet where tet.result="success"}
{toint(100*((tofloat(tc_exec_done_today)) / (tofloat(tc_exec_all_today.text))))}
{toint(tc_done) + toint(jira_done)}

dropdown.choices: {SELECT DISTINCT pbu.tester_name FROM progress_by_user pbu INNER JOIN tester U ON pbu.tester_name = U.tester_name WHERE U.tester_role = "Tester" }

table.recordset: {select pbu.date, pbu.tester_name, pbu.working_day, pbu.daily_work_done, pbu.sum_work_done, pbu.sum_work from progress_by_user pbu WHERE pbu.tester_name = sTestUserHistroy.selectedKey order by date DESC LIMIT 7}
{select e.tester_name from environment e group by e.tester_name}

let.value: {case when sum_work_done_reftab is null then sum_work_done.text else tostring(toint(sum_work_done.text) - sum_work_done_reftab) end}

dropdown.choices: {SELECT DISTINCT e.tester_name FROM environment e INNER JOIN tester U ON e.tester_name = U.tester_name WHERE U.tester_role = "Tester" }

textview.text: {select tostring(count(tet.result)) from task_env_table tet where tet.result="not yet started" and tet.env_name=env_by_result_r.env_name and tet.task_type="t"}
{select tostring(count(tet.result)) from task_env_table tet where tet.result="success" and tet.env_name=env_by_result_r.env_name and tet.task_type="t"}
{select tostring(count(tet.result)) from task_env_table tet where tet.result="failed" and tet.env_name=env_by_result_r.env_name and tet.task_type="t"}
{select tostring(count(tet.result)) from task_env_table tet where tet.result="not tested" and tet.env_name=env_by_result_r.env_name and tet.task_type="t"}
{select tostring(count(tet.result)) from task_env_table tet where tet.result="bad test case" and tet.env_name=env_by_result_r.env_name and tet.task_type="t"}

let.value: {select count(tet.result) from task_env_table tet where tet.result="not yet started" and tet.env_name is null and tet.task_type="t"}
{select count(tet.result) from task_env_table tet where tet.result="not yet started" and tet.env_name is null and tet.task_type="j"}

textview.text: {select tostring(count(tet.result)) from task_env_table tet where tet.result="not yet started" and tet.tester_name=tester_by_result_r.tester_name and tet.task_type="j"}
{select tostring(count(tet.result)) from task_env_table tet where tet.result="closed" and tet.tester_name=tester_by_result_r.tester_name and tet.task_type="j"}
